root.Summary: 1: Maggiolini S, De Carlini CC, Ferri LA, Colombo GI, Gentile G, Meles E, Riva B,Casella TC, Imazio M, Brucato A. The role of early contrast-enhanced chestcomputed tomography in the aetiological diagnosis of patients presenting withcardiac tamponade or large pericardial effusion. Eur Heart J Cardiovasc Imaging. 2015 Sep 15. pii: jev225. [Epub ahead of print] PubMed PMID: 26377905.
